pm4py.algo.alpha package¶

Submodules¶

pm4py.algo.alpha.classic module¶

pm4py.algo.alpha.classic.apply(trace_log, activity_key='concept:name')[source]¶

This method calls the “classic” alpha miner.

Parameters:
  • trace_log (pm4py.log.instance.TraceLog) – Event log to use in the alpha miner, note that it should be a TraceLog!
  • activity_key (str, optional) – Key to use within events to identify the underlying activity. By deafult, the value ‘concept:name’ is used.
Returns:

net – A Petri net describing the event log that is provided as an input
Return type:

pm4py.models.petri.instance.PetriNet

References

..[1] Wil M. P. van der Aalst et al., “Workflow Mining: Discovering Process Models from Event Logs”, IEEE Trans. Knowl. Data Eng., 16, 1128-1142, 2004. DOI.
